description:
This meetup will cover the basics of systems thinking and systems science; the building block towards an understanding of complexity and chaos theory. 
The event will cover topics such as:
– What are Systems?
– The mechanistic and the systemic worldview
– How we do talk about and describe Systems?
– When was Systems Thinking first created?
– What are its applications today?
– What tools can we use to map Systems?
name: Systems Thinking - An introduction
